pdf.name: pdf
pdf.description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and filling forms

docx.name: docx
docx.description: Comprehensive document creation, editing, and analysis with support for tracked changes, comments, formatting preservation, and text extraction

pptx.name: pptx
pptx.description: Presentation creation, editing, and analysis. When Claude needs to work with presentations (.pptx files) for creating new presentations, modifying content, working with layouts, or adding comments

xlsx.name: xlsx
xlsx.description: Comprehensive spreadsheet creation, editing, and analysis with support for formulas, formatting, data analysis, and visualization

algorithmic-art.name: algorithmic-art
algorithmic-art.description: Creating algorithmic art using p5.js with seeded randomness and interactive parameter exploration. Use this when users request creating art using code, generative art, algorithmic art, flow fields, or particle systems

frontend-design.name: frontend-design
frontend-design.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, artifacts, posters, or applications

mcp-builder.name: mcp-builder
mcp-builder.description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers that enable LLMs to interact with external services through well-designed tools

skill-creator.name: skill-creator
skill-creator.description: Guide for creating effective skills. This skill should be used when users want to create a new skill (or update an existing skill) that extends Claude's capabilities

superpowers.name: superpowers
superpowers.description: Core skills library for Claude Code with 20+ battle-tested skills including TDD, debugging, and collaboration patterns. Provides brainstorming, planning, and execution commands

senior-architect.name: senior-architect
senior-architect.description: Advanced software architecture skills for system design, microservices, event-driven architecture, and technical leadership. Guides through making architectural decisions and evaluating trade-offs

product-management.name: product-management
product-management.description: Product management skills for roadmapping, user stories, prioritization frameworks, MVP definition, and product strategy. Bridges technical and business perspectives

devops-engineer.name: devops-engineer
devops-engineer.description: DevOps engineering skills for CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, container orchestration, monitoring, and deployment automation. Covers Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms

bioinformatics.name: bioinformatics
bioinformatics.description: Comprehensive bioinformatics skills for genomic data analysis, sequence alignment, phylogenetic analysis, and working with biological databases like GenBank and UniProt

data-analysis.name: data-analysis
data-analysis.description: Scientific data analysis skills covering statistical methods, data visualization with matplotlib/seaborn, hypothesis testing, and exploratory data analysis

cheminformatics.name: cheminformatics
cheminformatics.description: Cheminformatics skills for molecular analysis, drug discovery, chemical database queries, and molecular property prediction using RDKit and computational chemistry tools

sequential-thinking.name: sequential-thinking
sequential-thinking.description: Advanced reasoning and step-by-step problem-solving skill. Enables Claude to break down complex problems into sequential steps, think through each stage methodically, and provide structured analytical output

n8n-workflow.name: n8n-workflow
n8n-workflow.description: n8n workflow automation skills. Teach Claude to build production-ready n8n workflows covering 525+ nodes and 2653+ templates. Includes integration patterns and best practices for workflow automation

hf-llm-trainer.name: hf-llm-trainer
hf-llm-trainer.description: Hugging Face LLM training skill. Fine-tune and train open-source language models using TRL (Transformer Reinforcement Learning) on Hugging Face Jobs. Covers model training, evaluation, and deployment workflows

hf-dataset-creator.name: hf-dataset-creator
hf-dataset-creator.description: Hugging Face dataset management skill. Create, configure, and manage datasets on the Hugging Face Hub. Includes tools for dataset creation, content management, and publishing

code-documentation.name: code-documentation
code-documentation.description: Automatic code documentation generation skill. Automatically documents all AI-generated code changes in Markdown format with real-time HTML viewer. Ensures comprehensive documentation for code changes

skill-seekers.name: skill-seekers
skill-seekers.description: Convert documentation websites into Claude Skills. Tool that transforms documentation sites into skill format for easy integration and automated skill creation from existing docs

document.name: Document Processing
document.description: Skills for working with documents (PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX)

creative.name: Creative & Design
creative.description: Skills for creative work, art generation, and visualization

development.name: Development Tools
development.description: Skills for software development, architecture, and tooling

productivity.name: Productivity & Workflow
productivity.description: Skills for improving productivity, reasoning, and documentation

business.name: Business & Product
business.description: Skills for product management, strategy, and business operations

operations.name: Operations & DevOps
operations.description: Skills for DevOps, CI/CD, infrastructure, and deployment

science.name: Scientific Computing & ML
science.description: Skills for bioinformatics, ML training, data analysis, and research

automation.name: Automation & Workflow
automation.description: Skills for workflow automation and integration

tools.name: Tools & Utilities
tools.description: Skills for tools, converters, and utilities
